gameDetails.name: Altiplano: Alpaca Rider Role Tile
gameDetails.description:
New Special Tiles. Mini expansion, contained in "Deutscher Spielepreis 2018 Goodie Box" and later contained in Level Up Loot 2.

The Deutscher Spielepreis 2018 Goodie Box is a product to support the Deutscher Spielepreis, the second-largest German board game award, in which thousands of players vote each year between May and July for their favorite game.

The Alpaca Rider is a new role tile for Altiplano, only playable with the Traveler expansion. The Alpaca Rider starts with 1 food, 1 alpaca, 1 ore, 1 opal and 1 coin. The Alpaca Rider's action requires any one good and can be used at any location. When you carry out the action, move your player pawn to the location where the Traveler is currently located.
